item.title: Netanyahu gifts Fetterman a silver-plated beeper after he praised Israel's Lebanon pager operation
item.description: Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu gave Sen; John Fetterman a silver-plated pager during his visit this week.

item.title: Disgraced ex-Congressman Weiner receives campaign donation from unexpected New Yorker in new race
item.description: Anthony Weiner received donations to his campaign for City Council of New York City from ex-wife Huma Abedin and her sister, Heba Abedin, according to...

item.title: Judge denies embattled government-funded agency's restraining order request against DOGE
item.description: The U.S. Institute for Peace's temporary restraining order request against DOGE was denied by Judge Beryl Howell on Wednesday, though she criticized D...

item.title: Trump to sign executive order to abolish the Department of Education
item.description: President Donald Trump followed through on campaign promises to eradicate the Department of Education.

item.title: Faith leaders gather around Trump to pray in Oval Office: 'incredible day'
item.description: Faith leaders from across the country visited President Donald Trump on Wednesday at the White House, where they prayed in the Oval Office.
